title: EU AMLR 2027 Compliant <1>Right Now</1>
subtitle: While competitors panic about 2027 deadlines, you'll already be compliant. Our platform was built from day one to exceed tomorrow's requirements. MiCA ready. AMLD6 ready. Whatever comes next, you're ready.

2023.title: Regulation Announced
2023.description: EU unveils comprehensive Anti-Money Laundering Regulation affecting both KYC and AML processes.

2024.title: Smart Companies Prepare
2024.description: Forward-thinking businesses upgrade their KYC verification and AML monitoring systems.

2025.title: Standards Finalized
2025.description: Final technical requirements published. Last opportunity for cost-effective implementation.

2026.title: Compliance Testing Begins
2026.description: Regulators begin testing KYC and AML systems. Non-compliant companies face penalties.

2027.title: Full Enforcement
2027.description: Complete compliance required. Companies without proper KYC/AML systems face severe consequences.

enhancedDueDiligence.title: Instant eID Verification:
enhancedDueDiligence.description: Seamless integration with MitID, BankID, Freja, and 15+ EU eID systems. Verify any European customer in 30 seconds with 99.8% accuracy. No manual checks needed.

euRiskScoring.title: EU-Native Risk Intelligence:
euRiskScoring.description: AI trained on 10M+ real EU transactions. Understands cross-border patterns, jurisdiction-specific risks, and regional behaviors that generic systems completely miss.

regulatoryIntelligence.title: Auto-Updating Compliance:
regulatoryIntelligence.description: Rules engine that updates automatically when regulations change. New requirements? Your workflows adapt instantly. Zero downtime, zero manual updates.

multiRegulatorReporting.title: One-Click Regulatory Reports:
multiRegulatorReporting.description: Generate audit-ready reports for any EU authority instantly. Finanstilsynet, BaFin, ACPR, DNBâ€”every format, every requirement, automatically formatted.

didYouKnow.title: The Early Mover Advantage
didYouKnow.description: Companies that achieved AMLR compliance in 2024-2025 saved an average of 63% compared to those rushing in 2026. Plus they captured market share while competitors were stuck in implementation.

ctaSection.title: Stop Delaying. Start Leading.
ctaSection.subtitle: Every month you wait makes compliance more expensive and risky. Get AMLR 2027 compliant today and turn regulatory pressure into competitive advantage.
